      • OACheckBox

        public OACheckBox(Hub hub,
                  Hub hubSelect)
        Bind a button to have it add/remove objects with another Hub.
        Parameters:
        hub - that has active object that is added/removed from hubSelect
        hubSelect - the active object from hub will be added/removed from this Hub.
